genevoisgame 0.1.0

Gather outcomes

gather_outcomes.Rd

This function gathers the outcome variables (utility, depth, pumping) from evaluate_treaty_cases in a format that makes it easier to plot and visualize with ggplot2.

gather_outcomes(treaty_df)

Arguments

treaty_df

Outcomes from evaluate_treaty_cases, including utility, depth, pumping

Examples

library(genevoisgame)
library(ggplot2)
#> Want to understand how all the pieces fit together? Read R for Data
#> Science: https://r4ds.had.co.nz/
library(tidyr)
#> 
#> Attaching package: ‘tidyr’
#> The following object is masked from ‘package:testthat’:
#> 
#>     matches
params <- example_params_confined
params$gs <- NULL
params <- crossing(params,gs=seq(0,1,by=0.05))
treaty_df <- evaluate_treaty_cases(params,'qudp')
treaty_long <- gather_outcomes(treaty_df)

ggplot(treaty_long) +
  geom_line(aes(x=gs,y=val,color=country,linetype=variable_subcat)) +
  facet_wrap(~variable_cat,scales="free_y",ncol=1) +
  scale_linetype_manual(values=c("solid","dashed","dotted","longdash")) +
  theme(legend.key.width = unit(1,"cm"))
